pylapp.smoothclicker.android.json

Class JsonConfigImporter

  • java.lang.Object
    • pylapp.smoothclicker.android.json.JsonConfigImporter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConfigImporter

    public class JsonConfigImporter
extends java.lang.Object
implements ConfigImporter
    Class which consists on importing the configuration of the app from a JSON file
    Since:
    27/05/2016
    Version:
    1.3.0
    Author:
    pylapp
    See Also:
